sections.heading: Legislative findings regarding offensive geographic place names
sections.text: Section 1-19C-1.1 - 1-19C-1.1, 1-19C-2.Repealed by SL 2014, ch 9, §§2, 3.Section 1-19C-2.1 - South Dakota Board on Geographic Names created--Members--Meetings--Investigations--Promulgation of rules.Section 1-19C-2.2 - Board may only act

sections.heading: Board may only act on name change if identified by law as offensive or insulting--Exception.
